snippet.title: A Bird Story - Trailer
snippet.description:
Thanks for the patience, folks! I'll try my best to wrap it up. c: Please help spread the word! 

A Bird Story will be coming to Steam, GOG, and more, on November 7th, 2014. It will be available for Windows, Mac, and Linux. Here's the press release: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/55619539/A_Bird_Story-Trailer-PR.doc

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Reives_Freebird
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FreebirdGames


Additional Game Credits: 

Original Artwork:
------------------------
Alisa Christopher
Joakim Olofsson
Jordan Baer

[Pending]
